snippet: Venezuelan officials who traveled to the Amazon to investigate a report of a mass killing in an indigenous community have found no evidence of any killings, government officials said.
abstract: Venezuelan officials who traveled to the Amazon to investigate a report of a mass killing of Yanomami Indians say they found no evidence of the massacre reported by the indigenous community.
lead_paragraph: Venezuelan officials who traveled to the Amazon to investigate a report of a mass killing in an indigenous community have found no evidence of any killings, government officials said.

headline.seo: Venezuela Finds No Sign of Reported Massacre
headline.main: Venezuela Finds No Sign of Massacre
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Finds No Sign Of Massacre
